choices.name: Patient_Video_Consent_Obtained_Visit_conducted_by_synchronous_telehealth_Veteran
choices.choiceText: Patient Video Consent Obtained: Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth. Veteran verbal consent obtained. Location/emergency number confirmed.

value.stringValue: Patient Video Consent Obtained: Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth. Veteran verbal consent obtained. Location/emergency number confirmed.

Flow.description:
This subflow is used to display VCV specific screen when creating a progress note.
Release 1.17.0 CCCM-40717: Virtual Visit Type Checkboxes visibility and validation fix.
Release 1.15.0 CCCM-35068 Added Preferred Name and Pronoun to the verify screen.
Release 1.14.0 CCCM-35079 Added update element to get the case subtype in sync with the Progress Note Virtual Visit type selection
Release 1.14.0 CCCM-34035 Added caseMetrics to hold the case metrics recordId and added it to create progress note element
Release 1.12.0 - Adding current appointment facility to the Patient Verification Screen
Release 1.10.0: Added CAPSLOCK and Patient Declined Location ID on verify emergency contact screen. Also added reference in the create element to transfer the checkbox value to corresponding fields on the Progress Note.
Release 1.11.0 - Added Apex Action for MPI Callout - Ronald
Added picklist field for Virtual Visit Type on the verify emergency contact screen, added duplicate checkboxes of CAPSLOCK, Patient Declined Location ID and Patient Video Consent Obtained for the Video option, edited conditional visibility and added validation inputs for these checkboxes. Edited mapping to the corresponding fields on the Create Progress Note element to reflect these changes.
Added additional read-only fields to the Patient Verification Screen
Updates for 1.11.0 CCCM-32494 - Removed VA Identity. Retrieved Place of Birth - City, Place of Birth - State and Mother's Maiden Name from Account. Updated formBlankPlaceOfBirthCityAndState as well as Mother's Maiden Name on the screen component.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient Picklist Choice Set
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Caller_Recipient_Relation_to_Patient_Picklist_Choice_Set

formulas.description: Converts the service appointment facility to a string
formulas.name: appointmentFacilityText
formBlankAddress
formulas.expression:
/*This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Address field. This maintains the formatting for the patient verification screen. */
IF( ISBLANK({!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingStreet}) && ISBLANK({!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingCity}) && ISBLANK({!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingState}) && ISBLANK({!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingPostalCode}), BR(), {!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingStreet} & BR() & {!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingCity} & ", " & {!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingState} & " " & {!getRelatedAccountFields.BillingPostalCode} )

formulas.name: formBlankBranchOfService
formBlankDateOfBirth
formBlankMilitaryServiceNumber
formBlankMobilePhone

formulas.description: This formula returns null if the city and state fields are blank.
formulas.name: formBlankPlaceOfBirthCityAndState
formBlankPrimaryPhone
formBlankServiceDates
formBlankSSN

fields.name: VerifyEmergencyContactPhoneandAddress
fields.fieldText: Verify Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient, Emergency Contact, Current Location and Call Back Number

fields.name: If_Other_Describe_Relation_to_Patient
fields.fieldText: If Other Describe Relation to Patient

validationRule.errorMessage: Text for If Other Describe Relation to Patient is too long. Please limit the text to 80 characters or less.
Text for Caller/Recipient Name is too long. Please limit the text to 50 characters or less.
Text is too long for Emergency Contact. Please limit text to 254 characters or less.
The Emergency Contact Phone Number is too long. Please limit phone number to 40 digits or less.

fields.name: Current_Address
fields.helpText: Current location of patient, if different from Primary Address

fields.name: Current_Phone1
fields.helpText: Best callback number for the patient, if different from the Primary Phone

validationRule.errorMessage: The Call Back Number is too long. Please limit phone number to 40 digits or less.

fields.name: acknowledgeCheckBox
fields.fieldText: I acknowledge that I have verified the Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient, Emergency Contact Information, Current Location and Call Back Number.

fields.name: PatientIdentifierCheckbox
fields.fieldText: Two patient identifiers have been stated by the patient/contact.
fields.helpText: Patient must be verified with their full name and at least two of the following: SSN, military service number, branch of service, service dates, date of birth, place of birth, home address, spouse’s name, mother's maiden name, or next of kin.

fields.name: CAPS_lock
fields.fieldText: CAPSLOCK: Environment surveyed and all participants identified. Virtual conference room locked.

validationRule.errorMessage: CAPSLOCK is required for Video Visit Type.

fields.name: Patient_Video_Consent_Obtained
fields.fieldText: Patient Video Consent Obtained: Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth. Veteran verbal consent obtained. Location/emergency number confirmed.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please select at least one of these checkboxes before proceeding.

fields.name: Patient_Declined_Location_ID
fields.fieldText: Patient Declined Location ID: The patient does not wish to provide their location or emergency contact information. The risk of delayed emergency support was given to the Veteran and they still agreed to continue with the visit.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please select at least one of these checkboxes before proceeding.
